entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow in the evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
